name: Abdul ALEEM, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Judge Amanda Cooperman, Respondent

parties: Abdul ALEEM, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Judge Amanda Cooperman, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of September, 2009, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus are DISMISSED. The Prothonotary is directed to forward these filings to counsel of record. See CP-51-CR-0103821-2005. The Prothonotary is also directed to strike the jurist’s name from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
981 A.2d 1282
Abdul ALEEM, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Judge Amanda Cooperman, Respondent.
No. 108 EM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 16, 2009.
